description:
When a mysterious fortune teller agrees to help out Yuma’s friends, they soon find themselves in a terrifying situation that no one ever saw coming!  Can Yuma rescue his pals, or will the all-knowing Fortuno see to it that Yuma doesn’t succeed?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Subete o Mitoosusha Kyoufu no Uranaishi Jin
The Psychic Who Predicts all Fear!
すべてを見通す者 恐怖の占い師・ジン
